mapper.delete: DELETE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_URL = #{noticeUrl} AND REF_UNO = #{refUno};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NOTICE_TYPE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_URL, REF_UNO, CREATE_DATETIME,RESULT ,TYPE) VALUES (#{noticeType},#{noticeContent},#{noticeTitle},#{noticeUrl},#{refUno},SYSDATE(),#{result},#{type} )
